word_mean: 放大器，扩大器：增加输入信号强度的一种电子装置或增大显微镜倍率之器具

entry.def: An amplifier is an electronic device in a radio or stereo system which causes sounds or signals to get louder.

means.word_mean: 1. electronic equipment that increases strength of signals passing through it

stems_affixes.type_exp: 表名词,"人或物",由-ify转化而来

stems_affixes.value_cn: 弄虚作假者,伪造者,撒谎的人,伪证的人
stems_affixes.word_buile: falsify窜改的名词→n.弄虚作假者,伪造者,撒谎的人,伪证的人
amplify放大的名词→n.放大器,扩大器
glorify使更壮丽,赞扬的名词→n.颂扬者

means.word_mean: 扩音器, 放大器,扬声器
